commands/overview.title: Commands Overview
commands/overview.description: cc-self-refer provides a comprehensive set of commands for managing your project context. These commands are available both through the CLI and as Claude Code slash commands.

commands/page-refer.title: Refer Page - Load Session History Context

commands/page-save.title: Page Save - Session History Dump with Citations and Memory Management

commands/pattern-create.title: Code Pattern - Save Reusable Code Patterns

commands/pattern-use.title: Use Code Pattern - Apply Predefined Code Patterns

commands/plan-create.title: Plan Create - Create New Implementation Planning Document

commands/plan-resolve.title: Plan Resolve - Execute Strategic Plans and Mark Complete

commands/spec.title: Spec - Adaptive Interactive Project Planning System

getting-started/first-steps.title: First Steps
getting-started/first-steps.description: Learn the essential commands and workflows to get productive with cc-self-refer quickly.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: Get started with cc-self-refer in just a few minutes. This guide will walk you through installing the CLI tool and setting up your first project.

getting-started/setup.title: Initial Setup
getting-started/setup.description: After installing cc-self-refer, you need to initialize your project to start using the self-reference capabilities. This guide walks through the setup process.

getting-started/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
getting-started/troubleshooting.description: Common issues and solutions for cc-self-refer.

guides/best-practices.description: Maximize the value of cc-self-refer with these proven practices.

guides/ide-integration.description: Enhance your development experience by integrating cc-self-refer with your favorite IDE.

guides/team-collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
guides/team-collaboration.description: Effectively share and manage context across your development team.

guides/workflow-optimization.title: Workflow Optimization
guides/workflow-optimization.description: Streamline your development process with optimized cc-self-refer workflows.

intro/architecture.title: Architecture Overview
intro/architecture.description: cc-self-refer implements a layered architecture designed to seamlessly integrate with Claude Code while maintaining clean separation of concerns.

intro/index.title: Introduction
intro/index.description: cc-self-refer is a powerful CLI tool that enables intelligent self-reference capabilities for Claude Code projects. It provides organized context management through the .claude directory structure, allowing Claude Code to maintain awareness across sessions and build upon previous work.

intro/self-referring-model.title: Self-Referring Model
intro/self-referring-model.description: The Self-Referring Model is the core concept behind cc-self-refer. It enables Claude Code to maintain context awareness across sessions by creating a feedback loop where the AI can reference its own previous work.

tips/performance.description: Optimize cc-self-refer for large projects and fast operations.

tips/troubleshooting.description: Advanced troubleshooting techniques for cc-self-refer issues.
